name: 110%
effect: Before playing, choose X to equal 0, 2, 3, 4. If X = 0, your attacks gain +2000 until your next Draw Step. If X = 2, choose for your attacks to gain either +3000 or +5000 until your next Draw Step. If X = 3, your attacks gain either +4000 or +6000 until your next Draw Step. If X = 4, your attacks gain +9000 until your next Draw Step.

All of your characters in play gain +1000 defense for each type of Team Symbol on all of your characters in play. Limit 1 per Deck.

name: Chant of Recollection

If X = 4, your attacks gain the text printed Attack Value of any attack in play to your attack(s) until your next Draw Step. If X = 4, your attacks gain the text “If this attack’s Attack Value is 4 or more times that of your opponent’s character’s Defense Value this attack deals 4 points of damage instead of 2.” If X = 7, do both.
